ComicInfo.Title: Richard Burton; Cracked Interviews the Oil King; Pre-Historic News; The Inept-One Factor; Are You a Loser?; More Cracked Solutions for Solving the Energy Crisis; A Cracked Look at the Good Old Days?; Policeman; The Cracked Guide to Tennis; What to Do with Your Obsolete Gas Guzzler; The Six Billion Dollar Man
ComicInfo.Summary: A knight saves a damsel from a dragon but the knight is also a dragon.
